text: Read content of RAR file into memory in Python
I'm looking for a way to read specific files from a rar archive into memory.
Specifically they are a collection of numbered image files (I'm writing a comic reader).
While I can simply unrar these files and load them as needed (deleting them when done), I'd prefer to avoid that if possible.
That all said, I'd prefer a solution that's cross platform (Windows/Linux) if possible, but Linux is a must.
Just as importantly, if you're going to point out a library to handle this for me, please understand that it must be free (as in beer) or OSS.
